main.title: About me
main.content: My passion for human interfaces led me to work as Flash (‚úù 2016) developer for a decade, later I moved to open standards and webdesign. Most of my career passed in France for Agencies and start-ups. At the end of 2018 I started to offer my services as freelance.

references.title: References
references.description: Proudly I present a brief list with my last works

peaks.definition: Wordpress theme creation for recruitment Agency. Also was neccessary to create a simple interface to access a MySQL database with job offers and make possible for visitors to apply.

taskl.definition: One page site created in plain html as static site. Use of gulp plugins to generate different versions for each language.

exoskills.definition: Static website update using bootstrap and svg animations
